attributes.action: answer reports that the electoral system is vulnerable to fraud, as a report released today claims.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The report, by the Joseph Rowntree Reform Trust, claims that measures to improve choice for voters are actually hitting the integrity of the electoral process. The petitioner is calling on the P.M. ahead of local elections on Thursday, to reassure voters on how  radical reforms to bring the electoral system up to date will work.

Based on "Purity of Elections in the UK: Causes for Concern", please address calls for all voters to produce photographic ID, "robust" systems for monitoring postal and proxy votes and restrictions on campaign spending by parties at constituency level.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
